solution_line_template: Randy has only half as many water balloons as Janice’s {janice_balloons}, for a total of ({randy_fraction_of_janice})*{janice_balloons}={randy_balloons} water balloons.

Cynthia has {cynthia_multiplier} times as many water balloons as Randy, for a total of {cynthia_multiplier}*{randy_balloons}=<<{cynthia_multiplier}*{randy_balloons}={cynthia_balloons}>>{cynthia_balloons} water balloons
